meanings.definition: A member of a group of violent criminals.
meanings.sent1: The gangstas were arrested for their illegal activities.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was afraid of the gangstas causing trouble.
meanings.sent3: The gangstas tried to steal candy from a baby, but ended up with a lollipop stuck on their face.
meanings.sent4: The gangstas' presence in the area cast a shadow of fear over the community.
meanings.sent5: The gangstas' tattoos and tough demeanor made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A person who is involved in organized crime.
meanings.sent1: The gangstas were known for their connections to the underworld.
meanings.sent2: The police were tracking down the gangstas involved in the drug trade.
meanings.sent3: The gangstas held a secret meeting in the back of the dimly lit bar.
meanings.sent4: The gangstas' operations ran smoothly like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The gangstas' flashy cars and expensive suits hinted at their criminal ties.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in criminal activities together.
meanings.sent1: The gangstas planned a heist to rob the bank.
meanings.sent2: The gangstas were always looking for their next illegal scheme.
meanings.sent3: The gangstas' hideout was a rundown warehouse on the outskirts of town.
meanings.sent4: The gangstas operated like a pack of wolves, preying on the vulnerable.
meanings.sent5: The gangstas' code of silence kept them united in their criminal endeavors.
